name: Nyx Assassin
title: Anub'arak
lore: Nyx Assassin serves Nyx, goddess of the night. He waits in shadows before striking with precision.

impale.name: Impale
impale.description: Sends a row of spikes that stun and damage enemies.

manaBurn.name: Mana Burn
manaBurn.description: Burns mana from an enemy based on their intelligence, dealing damage equal to mana burned.

spikedCarapace.name: Spiked Carapace
spikedCarapace.description: Nyx's shell hardens, reflecting and stunning the next source of damage.

vendetta.name: Vendetta
vendetta.description: Nyx becomes invisible with bonus movement speed. His next attack deals massive bonus damage.
